00013 # Define UCD defaults for well-known VOTable columns.
00014 
00015 define DEF_ACREF_UCD    "VOX:Image_AccessReference"
00016 define DEF_FORMAT_UCD   "VOX:Image_Format"
00017 
00018 
00019 #  VOTable Summary structure.  Our purpose here is to save some of the
00020 #  commonly referenced elements from the parsing to simplify the applications
00021 #  code.  Many times we'll just want to skip straight to the table data,
00022 #  this gives us handles to the key nodes in case we need to get at more
00023 #  detailed parts of the document.  For nodes such as <FIELD>, we store the
00024 #  handle to the first element in the list and use the interface iterators
00025 #  to loop.
00026 
00027 define  SZ_VOT_STRUCT   11
00028 
00029 define  VOT_ROOT        Memi[$1  ]              # root VOTable handle
00030 define  VOT_RES         Memi[$1+1]              # RESOURCE handle
00031 define  VOT_TAB         Memi[$1+2]              # TABLE handle
00032 define  VOT_DATA        Memi[$1+3]              # DATA handle
00033 define  VOT_TDATA       Memi[$1+4]              # TABLEDATA handle
00034 
00035 define  VOT_INFO        Memi[$1+5]              # INFO handle
00036 define  VOT_PARAM       Memi[$1+6]              # PARAM handle
00037 define  VOT_FIELD       Memi[$1+7]              # FIELD handle
00038 
00039 define  VOT_NRES        Memi[$1+8]              # No. of RESOURCES
00040 define  VOT_NROWS       Memi[$1+9]              # No. of TABLEDATA rows
00041 define  VOT_NCOLS       Memi[$1+10]             # No. of TABLEDATA cols
00042 
00043 
00044 
00045 #  Procedure declarations.  In the SPP code we wish to allow readable names,
00046 #  but must map these to the 6 chars produced in the compiled code.
00047 
00048 define vx_openVOTABLE       vopene
00049 define vx_closeVOTABLE      vclose
